sentences.en: Chemical engineers have considerable background that is applicable to water pollution problems.
sentences.cn: 化学工程技术人员具有相当多的适用于解决水污染问题的基础知识.

sentences.en: Disable menu items when they are not applicable.
His analysis was macro, and not directly applicable to individual firms.
sentences.cn: 他的分析是宏观的, 个别商行不能直接引用.

sentences.en: Nor is the charge of over - refinement altogether applicable to the Brahmins.
sentences.cn: 指责绅士派文人过于文雅,也并非完全得当.

sentences.en: Read the text through and mark off the sections you find particularly applicable.
sentences.cn: 通读全文，画出你认为最有用的段落。

sentences.en: The method is applicable to both metalized and conventional solid propellants.
sentences.cn: 这种方法既适用于普通的推进剂,也适用于含金属的推进剂.

sentences.en: The question regarding is taken applicable only with respect to genetic drift.
sentences.cn: 因此近来繁殖问题只选用于遗传漂变.

sentences.en: The section of the form is not applicable in your case.
sentences.cn: 表格这一部分不适合你的情况.

sentences.en: This graphical technique is particularly applicable to high - relief structures.
sentences.cn: 图解方法特别适用于起伏大的构造.

sentences.en: This rule is not applicable to foreigners.
sentences.cn: 这项规定不适用于外国人.

sentences.en: This section of the law is applicable only to corporations.
sentences.cn: 这部分法律只适用于公司。

sentences.en: Unlike the previous formalism it is only applicable to polarized waves.
sentences.cn: 同上述形成体系不同,它只能适用于偏振波.

sentences.en: What is a reasonable standard for one family is not applicable for another.
sentences.cn: 对一个家庭合理的标准对于另一个家庭并不适用。

sentences.en: Why array technology is directly applicable to digital functions is clear.
sentences.cn: 为什么阵列技术正好适用于数字式功能部件,是很清楚的.

sentences.en: Williams developed a method applicable to the study of whole cells.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯建立了一种用于研究全部细胞的方法.

sentences.en: With this restricted frequency range it is not applicable to hydrocarbons.
sentences.cn: 这个较紧缩的频率范围不适用于烃类.

words.tran_cn: 适用的；有用的；可应用的
应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

trans.tran_cn: 适当的，可应用的，适用的
trans.tran_en: if something is applicable to a particular person, group, or situation, it affects them or is related to them
